channel.title: Plz bring rep back
channel.description:
rep has been baned so i made a petishion to bring it back mod taharok said [quote="mod taharok"]Rep has been disabled on [url=http://moparisthebest.com\smf\]Moparscape[/url] It has been disabled due the the amount of spammers and people flaming each other. This dirty community has had it's punishments, and this is just another one. [url=http://moparisthebest.com\smf\]Moparisthebest[/url] rep still works, however.[/quote] i asked when will it come back he said [quote="mod taharok"]Well at first moparisthebest was saying he was planning on spliting rep from Moparisthebest.com with the rep from Moparscape.org. But then he disabled it from Moparscape.org and I am not sure if he is working on it anymore. I tried posting a new suggestion to keep rep, but to make people not spam it anymore. He was considering it but I do not think he will be using it =/.[/quote]
basicly reps been banned beacause of a few idiots so if you want to keep rep sign

rep has been baned so i made a petishion to bring it back
mod taharok said [quote=“mod taharok”]Rep has been disabled on Moparscape It has been disabled due the the amount of spammers and people flaming each other. This dirty community has had it’s punishments, and this is just another one. Moparisthebest rep still works, however.[/quote]

[quote=“mod taharok”]Well at first moparisthebest was saying he was planning on spliting rep from Moparisthebest.com with the rep from Moparscape.org. But then he disabled it from Moparscape.org and I am not sure if he is working on it anymore. I tried posting a new suggestion to keep rep, but to make people not spam it anymore. He was considering it but I do not think he will be using it =/.[/quote]

so if you want to keep rep sign
